TopicTitle: ACorp Technologies Cestrol-150 Munar System [MechJeb Only]

Articles.Content:
The ACorp Cestrol-150

This rocket is my current go-to lightweight rocket. It is able to take one kerbal to any of the moons of Kerbin and back. This design features a launch escape tower, which upon pressing Backspace saves your poor kerbal from any misfortunes.

Here are some pictures of the Cestrol-150 on the pad:

The key bindings:

Abort = Decouples rocket and activates Launch Escape System

0 = Opens parachutes and decouples LES (Meant to be used after Abort)

9 = Ejects LES with remaining two boosters

Launch List:

1.Liftoff and burn full throttle until first stage runs out of fuel; decouple first stage

2.Once at 10 km, begin gravity turn

3.Raise your apoapsis to about 100 km

4. Set a maneuver node to circularize at 100 km, and execute it.

5. Now, with the remaining fuel, you can plot a maneuver node to intercept the Mun or Minmus.

6. Have Fun!

Warning: This product is equipped with the Mechjeb 2.0 flight computer. Use at your own risk.

And here is the download: http://www./download/f7tzy626pnnjt72/ACorp_Cestrol_C-150.craft

*ACorp Technologies is not responsible for any injury caused by the usage of the above rockets, including but not limited to: seisures, fits of rage, broken computers, or death.
